pkgmetadata.longdescription: Replicability Analysis of High-Throughput Experiments // Implementing a computationally scalable false discovery rate control procedure for replicability analysis based on maximum of p-values. Please cite the manuscript corresponding to this package [Lyu, P. et al., (2023), https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2023.02.13.528417v2].
